title: Politically Correct To Stay Friends With Your BFFâ€™s Ex? Bollywood Celebs Think So!
text:
facebook 291 SHARES 
In Bollywood, friendships and relationships change in a heartbeat, and hence nothing lasts forever. Not even Karan Johar and Kajol ! In real life, things function a little differently. Like, when a sibling or BFF breaks up with a partner, than that means your friendship is over with them too. We're not saying that's the right way to go, but that's mostly how things happen. But in B-town celebrity-land, it's seems okay for someone to hang out with a friend or sibling's ex, without making it look awkward. 
Amrita Arora and Arbaaz Khan: Now that Amrita's sister Malaika has separated from husband Arbaaz Khan, we didn't expected the two to mingle, but guess we were wrong. Arbaaz and Amrita both celebrated Christmas together. Amrita's Instagram post says that! X'mas vibes at the moms! #joycesbash #familyfirst @arbaazkhanofficial @joycearora A photo posted by Amrita Arora (@amuaroraofficial) on Dec 25, 2016 at 2:03am PST 
Arpita Khan and Katrina Kaif: We all know what equation Salman Khan (Arpita's brother) and Katrina shared. Post the Salman-Kat break up it was obvious that the â€˜Khandaan' would not have anything to do with Katrina. But that's not how it went down! Katrina was very much part of Arpita's wedding ceremonies. In fact, six weeks ago the two were seen partying hard together at a private bash. Love you gorgeous ðŸ˜˜! La familia A photo posted by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Dec 6, 2016 at 8:59am PST 
Zayed Khan and Hrithik Roshan: Hrithik and Zayed have been friends for years and that has not changed despite Zayed's sister Sussanne getting a divorce from Hrithik. The two are very much in touch and recently Zayed was also seen attending Hrithik's birthday party. #HrithikRoshan in #Bandra with sons, #Hrehaan and #Hridhaan followed by #ZayedKhan with his sons, #Zidaan and #Aariz. A photo posted by Ram Dubey (@superstar_ram) on Jan 15, 2017 at 9:10am PST 
Ayan Mukerji and Deepika Padukone: Everyone knows that Ayan Mukherji is best friends with Ranbir Kapoor and Ranbir is the ex-boyfriend of Deepika Padukone's. Well, this didn't make things sour between Deepika and Ayan. The two are very much friends and also worked together on the film Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani. A photo posted by Deepika Padukone | Queen (@stunningdeepy) on Dec 11, 2016 at 3:56am PST Photo Credit: Instagram
